column5: Just being reported on NHL network
Yep....hard to believe they actually did something!  http://www.cp24.com/servlet/an/local/CTVNews/20120302/120302_wilson_fired/20120302/?hub=CP24Home
who did what to and with a fish?!?!?!?!

Ron is gone, but the ACC will still be filled to capacity, until they loose the fan base, nothin will be done to make the leafs a Stanley Cup hopefull, every year its the same, they start like they were shot out of a cannon, and then they go for a crap, next year will be the same, history repeats itself, and yes by my post you would not think so but I do like the leafs, but one good line wont get you a cup.
Well, if that is the case, then we must have a Cup in our future at some point, eh?
